channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump’s $499 ‘built in the U.S.’ smartphone will likely be made in China, analysts say, making it subject to his own tariff policy
item.description: “The idea that [manufacturing] could be replicated in the U.S. in any sort of short- to medium-term time scale is fanciful,” one analyst said.

item.title: OnlyFans (Finally) Discovers Its Red Line
item.description: But one must ask: What makes Bonnie Blue’s stunt more appalling than others on the platform?

item.title: Texas Lawmakers Have Failed Their Constituents on Immigration Enforcement

item.title: U.S. Should Destroy Fordow — but Only If Israel Can’t
item.description: The U.S. should not pursue a regime-change war akin to Iraq, but a congressionally approved, limited operation should be on the table.
